price: This is how We explain the verses in detail, so that the way of the evildoers may become known.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
